hero.title: Platform Features
hero.subtitle: Everything you need to teach, learn, and grow — in one platform.

cards.title: Canvas System
cards.description: A blank slate that fills with real lesson content — CIPs, ARPs, keywords, and notes. Every session builds a unique, personalized textbook.

cards.title: AI Assessment Engine
cards.description: 5-dimension assessment model analyzes real lesson transcripts automatically. Supports both AI-generated and manual assessments with CEFR alignment.

cards.title: Student Management
cards.description: Complete student profiles with progress history, CEFR levels, and learning analytics. Track every learner's journey from day one.

cards.title: Booking System
cards.description: Built-in scheduling with calendar integration, automated reminders, and timezone support. iCalendar invites for Gmail and Outlook.

cards.title: Spaced Repetition
cards.description: SM-2 algorithm targets actual weak points from real sessions. Auto-generated quizzes ensure lasting retention.

cards.title: CEFR Levels
cards.description: Internationally recognized framework for consistent, meaningful assessment. A1 through C2 with granular sub-level tracking.

cards.title: Multi-Language (i18n)
cards.description: Full platform interface available in English, Japanese, and Korean. Teach any language — the tools are language-agnostic.

cards.title: BYOK AI Integration
cards.description: Bring Your Own Key — connect your OpenAI or Anthropic API keys to extend the platform with custom AI features. No vendor lock-in.

cards.title: API for Schools
cards.description: RESTful API with per-teacher authentication tokens. Integrate The Living Textbook with your existing school infrastructure.
